block.p: ZISKIND--Samuel, died peacefully on January 10. Beloved brother of Muriel K. Harsip; devoted uncle of Herbert Harsip of Newton, MA, Janice Hurwitz of Framingham, MA, and Barry Harsip of Boxborough, MA. Cherished friend of Ed Strum. A memorial service will be held on Sunday, February 18, at the Village Temple, 33 East 12th Street, New York City at 12:00 noon. Sam was a unique and gentle combination of intelligence and concern with an insatiable quest for learning and understanding.
